original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 32
overview: The 32nd installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted!! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. In "Toaru Danchi no Koen", it seems that there has been a succession of reports of ghostly sightings in a park in a corner of a certain housing complex, but with the cooperation of the people involved, they are finally reflected clearly. We have succeeded in obtaining a video of the actual situation!! In addition, all 10 episodes of the finest horror footage are included!
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 32
